metadata.title: AKOAK 1 Pack Soft Hair Teapot Brush, Tea Set, Tea Ceremony Accessories, Household Kitchen Cleaning Tools
features: The brush head is excellent in material selection and can be used to maintain the tea tray.
The soft brush can evenly maintain every corner of the teapot without harming the teapot.
The pen is made of ebony wood, which is heavy and has a grade.
After dampening, the brush is even and close together, without burrs, soft and lint-free.
Quality teapot pen is the best choice for your teapot.
description: Material: ebony Category: tea ceremony accessories Craft: handmade Weight: approx. 70g Size: total length approx.16cm/6.3inch, diameter approx. 2cm/0.8inch used for: tea pot maintenance Package includes: 1 Pack soft hair teapot brush

- Made of high-quality natural wood, environmentally friendly materials, very suitable for tea lovers, harmless to the human body, healthy and durable, and safe to use. - The fluff is soft and used to clean the teapot without harming the teapot. - Mainly used to evenly sprinkle waste tea on the tea tray. - It can also be used to clean the teapot to ensure that there is not too much residue. - Can be used with other tea ceremony tools. - High strength, good toughness, easy to clean. - Simple and ingenious design, suitable for tea ceremony, office, tea room, reception room, coffee table. It can also be used as other tools. - As an indispensable tool in the entire tea art performance, the teapot pen is not only a practical tool, but also an artistic expression, which is deeply loved by many tea lovers.
